title: Bookify
description: Developed a scalable React.js frontend web app simplifying hotel bookings for optimized reservations. Incorporated modular components to enhance codebase maintainability and enable tailored booking experiences. Focused on optimizing app design to deliver a seamless user experience

title: React Notes App
description: Developed a scalable React.js frontend web app simplifying e-commerce functionality. • Designed a dynamic categorization system to facilitate effective section nesting and routing. • Implemented object-oriented programming practices such as inheritance to create different account types and databases
